DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `MEASURE_VALIDATION_LOG` ;
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `MEASURE_VALIDATION_LOG` ( `ID` VARCHAR(32) NOT NULL , `MEASURE_ID` VARCHAR(32) NOT NULL , `ACTIVITY_TYPE` VARCHAR(32) NOT NULL , `USER_ID` VARCHAR(40) NOT NULL , `TIMESTAMP` TIMESTAMP NOT NULL , `INTERIM_BLOB` LONGBLOB NULL , PRIMARY KEY (`ID`), INDEX `MEASURE_ID_FK` (`MEASURE_ID` ASC)) ENGINE = InnoDB;
